articles.description: The spring equinox occurs on March 19, 2020, at 11:49 p.m. Eastern Time—the earliest it has ever arrived in 124 years. Here's what you should know about it, including if you can balance an egg during the event.

articles.title: Wind, solar farms could bring rains to Sahara Desert - ETEnergyworld.com
articles.description: "Previous modeling studies have shown that large-scale wind and solar farms can produce significant climate change at continental scales," said Yan Li, a postdoctoral researcher at the University of Illinois in the US.
articles.content: Washington: A massive wind and solar installation in the Sahara Desert would increase precipitation and vegetation in the world's largest hot desert. The study, published in the journal Science, is a… [+2813 chars]
